name: Hair Biridal Headband from the Noa Collection - Pearls And Rhinestone, Vintage, Wedding,Tiara,Jewelr
description:
Special edition for Golden Bridal Weddings headband - features clear Swarovski crystals and ivory cream pearls handy wrapped with gold wire on a golden headband.

The hair band is versatile for many wedding styles; from classic summer to an occupied elegant evening.

Dainty headband that make a beautiful addition to your bridal ensemble, or a dressy option for 
everyday.

Measures: standard flexible gold plated metal headband.

** THIS HEADBAND CAN BE MADE IN SILVER WITH WHITE PEARLS TOO ***

This piece is 100% HAND DECORATED.
All of the items in my shop are handmade by "mylittlebride" Efrat Davidsohn.

Your headband will get to you in a beautiful gift box with a tiny ribbon.

Enjoy!

name: Vintage Golden Hip-Belt - Kate - With Golden Oval Filigree Flower Set With Freshwater Pearls
description:
A gorgeous golden high-finished pearls hip-belt.

Made with gold plated flower filigree set with Swarovski AB rhinestone crystals and fresh-water antique pink pearls.

Amazingly fits as a high-finish jewelry for the outfit as with an evening little small black dress or for casual wear.

Very comfortable , very stylish look!


measures: Total size in length 70 CM + 5 Cm for re-sizing The size of the middle golden filigree is Length: 3.5 cm
Width: (in the middle) 2 cm

The hip-belt is re-sizable.

If you'd like a different size - please convo me!

This piece is 100% HAND DECORATED.

All of the items in my shop are handmade by "mylittlebride" Efrat Davidsohn 

Your Hip-belt will get to you in a beautiful gift box with a tiny ribbon.


Enjoy!

name: Vintage  Bracelet  Wedding Pearls With Rhinestone from the Camilla Collection, Wrist Cuff,Ivory Whit
description:
This Unique vintage style bracelet features five rows of glamorous Swarovski ivory soft white and cream pearls and rhinestones with a high-finished silver sterling box closure set with antique tiny pearls and one freshwater pearl in the center.
It's so amazing with your wedding dress and fits especially to a vintage weddings.

This bracelet is a perfect handmade wedding accessory with romantic grace.If you need a beautiful matching earrings please contact me

measures: 7.5" (18.75 cm) in total length.

I recommend taking your exact wrist measurement, contact me for custom sizing and it will be made to your exact requirements. 

If you would like a different color - please convo me.

This piece is 100% HAND DECORATED.

All of my items are handmade by "mylittlebride" Efrat Davidsohn.

Your bracelet will get to you in a beautiful gift box with a tiny ribbon.

Enjoy!

name: Chandelier Deluxe Bridal Earrings from the - Helena Collection -Posts, Rhinestone,Pearls, Vintage, V
description:
A gorgeous shiny drop pearls earrings features Elegance and style: A beautiful chandelier earrings made of silver sterling filigree set with Swarovski rhinestone and vintage pearls, tiny ivory white pearls and teardrop pearls in three different height of rows.

The back of the earring is ear pierced.

Beautiful delicate bridal earrings features rhinestone and ivory pearls, a vintage Hollywood style design, very comfortable for the bride or the bridesmaids.

Dainty earrings that make a beautiful addition to your bridal ensemble, or a dressy option for
everyday. The crystals capture the light and reflect it, creating sparkle and shine; absolutely stunning! It is even more glamorous with the added pearls below.

These earrings are versatile for many wedding styles; from classic summer to an occupied elegant winter evening.

The earrings measures 2.4" (6 cm) in total length.

These earrings can be made in gold too.
If you like them in a different size or color- please convo me!

This piece is 100% HAND DECORATED.

All items in the shop are handmade by "my little bride" Efrat Davidsohn 

Your earrings will get to you in a beautiful gift box with a tiny ribbon.

Enjoy!

name: Bridal Pearl Necklace from the Florence collection, Vintage, Victorian Rhinestone Wedding Jewelry
description:
Beautiful bridal choker necklace, features three silver plated filigree flowers set with Ivory white freshwater pearls surrounded with Swarovski AB rhinestone connected between each flower with many handmade curled eye pins including white freshwater pearls and Ivory white Swarovski pearls.

The shape is Victorian style and fits so beautiful and delicate on your neck.
A perfect necklace for the bride or for any other special occasion.

This necklace is versatile for many wedding styles and occasions; from a classic summer to an occupied elegant evening.

I can only imagine this on some special girl's on her wedding day. 

This piece is 100% HAND DECORATED.

All of the items in my shop are handmade by  Efrat Davidsohn.

Your necklace will get to you in a beautiful gift box with a tiny ribbon.

Enjoy!
